adverbs.description: lollingly (comparative more lollingly, superlative most lollingly)

entries.meaning: So as to loll; in a lazy, relaxed attitude.
examples: Ibises half-lollingly posed on some old trunk, and gray herons motionless on one leg, solemn flamingoes who from a distance looked like red umbrellas scattered in the foliage, and phenicopters of every color, enlivened the temporary morass.
